summary: Requiem 1.8 patch for Unique Bows Collection by Artisanix
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8 patch for Unique Bows Collection by Artisanix

Damage, draw speed and prices have been adjusted based on the bow's material to match Requiem's values. Some of the crafted bows are tagged as breakable.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - UniqueBows.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - UniqueBows.esp after Requiem and UniqueBows and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
UniqueBows.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - UniqueBows.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32405/?]Unique Bows Collection[/url]: Artisanix
author: spikyfishy
